A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably the most disappointing film of my life and that's coming out of being furious over the bad episode 4 remake that was the Force Awakens. Characters have been completely rewritten to fit some strange interpretation of the star wars galaxy and even after learning nothing about the state of the universe in 7 we get to the end of 8 and still know almost nothing about what's happened or is going on. Plot holes can be acceptable\, but this galaxy seems like one major black hole for plot and my hopes and dreams for a good new trilogy. We lost the extended universe for this?
